sections.general:
ASSISTANT TO BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT ADMINISTRATOR
Professional Profile
Organized administrative professional with hands-on experience supporting business areas such as real-estate, finance, database management,
customer service and human resources. Collaborative team player with strong communication, decision-making and time management abilities.
Qualifications
Conduct follow-up evaluations with client and employer
Able to meet performance and outcome goals
Develop job opportunities and act as a liaison between client and
Create and maintain employer and client databases and files
the employer
Effectively identify client needs through good judgment and
Maintain timely documentation and reports according to stated
interview techniques
guidelines
Maintain updated case notes on each clientÂ
Provide referrals to community partners
Provide assistance and guidance relating to the interview process
Conduct program presentationsÂ
Conduct employer outreach as needed
Detail oriented, flexible and reliable
Relevant Experience
Managed major office relocation with only one day of downtime.
